verses.verse: For this cause <S%G5484><s%> I, <S%G1473><s%> Paul, <S%G3972><s%> am the prisoner <S%G1198><s%> of Christ <S%G5547><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> on behalf <S%G5228><s%> of you <S%G5216><s%> Gentiles, <S%G1484><s%>

if <S%G1489><s%> it is so that you have heard of <S%G191><s%> the administration <S%G3622><s%> of that grace <S%G5485><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> which <S%G3588><s%> was given <S%G1325><s%> me <S%G3427><s%> toward <S%G1519><s%> you; <S%G5209><s%>

how that <S%G3754><s%> by <S%G2596><s%> revelation <S%G602><s%> the mystery <S%G3466><s%> was made known <S%G1107><s%> to me, <S%G3427><s%> as <S%G2531><s%> I wrote before <S%G4270><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> few words, <S%G3641><s%>

by which, <S%G3739><s%> when <S%G4314><s%> you read, <S%G314><s%> you can <S%G1410><s%> perceive <S%G3539><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> understanding <S%G4907><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the mystery <S%G3466><s%> of Christ; <S%G5547><s%>

which <S%G3739><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> other <S%G2087><s%> generations <S%G2087><s%> was <S%G1107><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> made known <S%G1107><s%> to the children <S%G5207><s%> of men, <S%G444><s%> as <S%G5613><s%> it has <S%G601><s%> now <S%G3568><s%> been revealed <S%G601><s%> to <S%G3588><s%> his <S%G846><s%> holy <S%G40><s%> apostles <S%G652><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> prophets <S%G4396><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the Spirit; <S%G4151><s%>

that <S%G3588><s%> the Gentiles <S%G1484><s%> are <S%G1511><s%> fellow heirs, <S%G4789><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> fellow members of the body, <S%G4954><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> fellow partakers <S%G4830><s%> of his <S%G846><s%> promise <S%G1860><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> Jesus through <S%G1223><s%> the Good News, <S%G2098><s%>

of which <S%G3739><s%> I was made <S%G1096><s%> a servant, <S%G1249><s%> according to <S%G2596><s%> the gift <S%G1431><s%> of that grace <S%G5485><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> which was given <S%G1325><s%> me <S%G3427><s%> according <S%G2596><s%> to the working <S%G1753><s%> of his <S%G846><s%> power. <S%G1411><s%>

To me, <S%G1698><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> very least <S%G1647><s%> of all <S%G3956><s%> saints, <S%G40><s%> was <S%G1325><s%> this <S%G3778><s%> grace <S%G5485><s%> given, <S%G1325><s%> to preach <S%G2097><s%> to <S%G1722><s%> the Gentiles <S%G1484><s%> the unsearchable <S%G421><s%> riches <S%G4149><s%> of Christ, <S%G5547><s%>

and <S%G2532><s%> to make <S%G5461><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> men see <S%G5461><s%> what <S%G5101><s%> is the administration <S%G2842><s%> of the mystery <S%G3466><s%> which <S%G3588><s%> for <S%G575><s%> ages <S%G165><s%> has been hidden <S%G613><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> God, <S%G2316><s%> who <S%G3588><s%> created <S%G2936><s%> all things <S%G3956><s%> through <S%G1223><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ; <S%G5547><s%>

to the intent that <S%G2443><s%> now <S%G3568><s%> through <S%G1223><s%> the assembly <S%G1577><s%> the manifold <S%G4182><s%> wisdom <S%G4678><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> might be made known <S%G1107><s%> to the principalities <S%G746><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> the powers <S%G1849><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the heavenly places, <S%G2032><s%>

according to <S%G2596><s%> the eternal <S%G165><s%> purpose <S%G4286><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> he purposed <S%G4160><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> our <S%G2257><s%> Lord; <S%G2962><s%>

in <S%G1722><s%> whom <S%G3739><s%> we have <S%G2192><s%> boldness <S%G3954><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> access <S%G4318><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> confidence <S%G4006><s%> through <S%G1223><s%> our faith <S%G4102><s%> in him. <S%G846><s%>

Therefore <S%G1352><s%> I ask <S%G154><s%> that you may not <S%G3361><s%> lose heart <S%G1573><s%> at <S%G1722><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> troubles <S%G2347><s%> for <S%G5228><s%> you, <S%G5216><s%> which <S%G3748><s%> are <S%G2076><s%> your <S%G5216><s%> glory. <S%G1391><s%>

For this cause, <S%G5484><s%> I bow <S%G2578><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> knees <S%G1119><s%> to <S%G4314><s%> the Father <S%G3962><s%> of our <S%G2257><s%> Lord <S%G2962><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ, <S%G5547><s%>
from <S%G1537><s%> whom <S%G3739><s%> every <S%G3956><s%> family <S%G3965><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> heaven <S%G3772><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> on <S%G1909><s%> earth <S%G1093><s%> is named, <S%G3687><s%>

that <S%G2443><s%> he would grant <S%G1325><s%> you, <S%G5213><s%> according to <S%G2596><s%> the riches <S%G4149><s%> of his <S%G846><s%> glory, <S%G1391><s%> that you may be strengthened <S%G2901><s%> with power <S%G1411><s%> through <S%G1223><s%> his <S%G846><s%> Spirit <S%G4151><s%> in <S%G1519><s%> the inward <S%G2080><s%> man; <S%G444><s%>

that <S%G3588><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> may dwell <S%G2730><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> your <S%G5216><s%> hearts <S%G2588><s%> through <S%G1223><s%> faith; <S%G4102><s%> to the end that you, <S%G4492><s%> being rooted and <S%G2532><s%> grounded <S%G2311><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> love, <S%G26><s%>

may be strengthened <S%G1840><s%> to <S%G2443><s%> comprehend <S%G2638><s%> with <S%G4862><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> the saints <S%G40><s%> what <S%G5101><s%> is the breadth <S%G4114><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> length <S%G3372><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> height <S%G5311><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> depth, <S%G899><s%>

and <S%G5037><s%> to know <S%G1097><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%>'s love <S%G26><s%> which <S%G3588><s%> surpasses <S%G5235><s%> knowledge, <S%G1108><s%> that <S%G2443><s%> you may be filled <S%G4137><s%> with <S%G1519><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> the fullness <S%G4138><s%> of God. <S%G2316><s%>

Now <S%G1161><s%> to him who <S%G3588><s%> is able <S%G1410><s%> to <S%G5228><s%> do <S%G4160><s%> exceedingly abundantly <S%G4057><s%> above <S%G5228><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> that <S%G3739><s%> we ask <S%G154><s%> or <S%G2228><s%> think, <S%G3539><s%> according to <S%G2596><s%> the power <S%G1411><s%> that <S%G3588><s%> works <S%G1754><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> us, <S%G2254><s%>

to him <S%G846><s%> be the glory <S%G1391><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the assembly <S%G1577><s%> and in <S%G1722><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> to <S%G1519><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> generations <S%G1074><s%> forever <S%G165><s%> and ever. <S%G165><s%> Amen. <S%G281><s%>
